EmailTemplate.name: RE: An Introduction to MBO Partners (1326126951.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: An Introduction to MBO Partners (1326126951.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An Introduction to MBO Partners 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Jake,
I want to introduce you to Sara Conde. I am going to be out of the office the next few days and then going on another business trip and I won’t be able to provide you the service levels you should be getting from MBO. Sara is by far one of the best Consultant Services Advisors we have, you’re in great hands. I’ve gotten her up to speed and she looks forward to working with you and will be in touch soon.
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Steve Arhancet Sent: Saturday, January 07, 2012 11:33 AM To: Jake Levenson Subject: RE: An Introduction to MBO Partners
I spoke too early, it was in my junk email folder.
Steve
From: Jake Levenson [mailto:jlevenson@mac.com] Sent: Saturday, January 07, 2012 12:44 AM To: Valerie, Smith; Patrick Ramage Cc: Steve Arhancet Subject: An Introduction to MBO Partners
Dear Val and Patrick, The reason why I requested an electronic version of the contract to review was because I wanted to review it and introduce you to Steve Arhancet at MBO Partners. MBO Partners handles tax, expense, benefit, payment and contract management for independent consultants. Steve is my contact at MBO Partners that manages my various contracts. I wanted to send a brief introduction as a couple changes in the contract will be needed. His information is below and will be following up shortly. If interested more information can be found at www.mbopartners.com
Thanks, Jake
Steven Arhancet MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171 No virus found in this message. Checked by AVG - www.avg.com Version: 2012.0.1901 / Virus Database: 2109/4728 - Release Date: 01/07/12
